Posts.Content: hello everyone, I was dx Stage 1 IDC  and being scared.....My mom is a 19 year survivor and my inspiration to fight hard   she had no choice  but to have a mastectomy after multiple  reconstruct surgeries and getting serracia following the tram flap, rad and chemo and  got thro .for the past 2 years .. my mamms didn't show anything and when I discovered this lump 3 weeks ago, I had a bad feeling. Following the ultra bx , the waiting period was nightmare, and now trying to make the right choice, is hard, I have always been indecisive. I hope i can have bilat mastectomy and reconstruct, I feel like I need to take charge and eliminate the % ca in the breast and next i want to take out my ovaries. My teenagers lost there dad 11 years ago suddenly acute hemmor pancreatitis following a gall bladder being removed  and I  need to fight to live love life  laugh each day, with my children or teens and protect and discover ans. to help them and many in fighting cancer and .Ill take any advice,  my children are my whole world.
Posts.Title: Bi-lateral Masectomy
